title: Quarkus 3.4.3 released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.4.3, our second maintenance release for our 3.4 release train (we skipped 3.4.0).  It upgrades Netty to 4.1.100.Final, fixing CVE-2023-44487. It also includes a bunch of bugfixes, together with documentation improvements.  More releases are planned in the following days/weeks to address the issue in other maintained branches.   UPDATE  To update to Quarkus 3.4.3, we recommend updating to the latest version of the Quarkus CLI and run:  quarkus update  To migrate from 3.3, please refer to .  If you are not already using 3.x, please refer to the for all the details. You can also refer to for additional details. Once you upgraded to 3.0, also have a look at the , , and migration guides.   FULL CHANGELOG  You can get .   COME JOIN US  We value your feedback a lot so please report bugs, ask for improvements… Let’s build something great together!  If you are a Quarkus user or just curious, don’t be shy and join our welcoming community:   * provide feedback on ;   * craft some code and ;   * discuss with us on and on the ;   * ask your questions on .
